required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Six Month Randomized Open-Label Trial of Pressure Ulcer Healing With Microcyn® Skin and Wound Care With Preservatives Versus Sterile Saline in Adult Spinal Cord Injury Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to test how well Microcyn™ works on Stage 3 and Stage 4 pressure ulcers compared to sterile saline among persons with spinal cord injury.

primary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Size (Length x Width x Depth, cm^3) at Baseline
primary_outcome.time_frame: pressure ulcer size (length x width x depth, cm^3) at baseline
primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

primary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Size (Length x Width x Depth, cm^3) at 4 Weeks After Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

primary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Size (Length x Width x Depth, cm^3) at 8 Weeks After Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

primary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Size (Length x Width x Depth, cm^3) at 24 Weeks After Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Pressure ulcer size is measured after debridement if debridement is provided. The pressure ulcer size (cubic centimeter) is the length (centimeter) times the width (centimeter) times the depth(centimeter). The range of value is from 0 to positive infinite.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Scale for Healing (PUSH) Score
secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Scale for Healing (PUSH) Score at 4 Weeks After Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Scale for Healing (PUSH) Score at 16 Weeks After Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Scale for Healing (PUSH) Score at 20 Weeks After Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Pressure Ulcer Scale for Healing (PUSH) Score at 24 Weeks After Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: PUSH categorizes pressure ulcer by surface area, exudate, and type of wound tissue. A comparison of total scores measured over time provides an indication of the improvement or deterioration in pressure ulcer healing. Total score ranges from 0 (healed, normal) to 17 (most severe).

arm_group.description: Microcyn is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with Microcyn twice daily.
Sterile saline is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with sterile saline twice daily.

intervention.description: Microcyn is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with Microcyn twice daily for the earlier of total wound closure or Week 24
intervention.other_name: Microcyn® Skin and Wound Care with preservatives

intervention.description: Sterile saline is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with sterile saline twice daily for the earlier of total wound closure or Week 24

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 17 years
- Persons with spinal cord injury
- Having Stage III/IV pressure ulcer(s)
- Able to fulfill all obligations of the study
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pressure ulcers scheduled for surgical closure within 14 days
- Use of any immunosuppressant medications within 30 days of screening
- Having conditions that put the subject at significant risk
- Medically unstable or has a life expectancy of less than 12 months
- Current enrollment in an investigational drug or device study or participation in such a study within the last 30 days
- Pregnant women

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

group.title: Microcyn
group.description: Microcyn: Microcyn is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with Microcyn twice daily for the earlier of total wound closure or Week 24

group.description: Sterile saline: Sterile saline is liberally sprayed on wound and permitted to remain on wound which will then be dressed with gauze that is moistened with sterile saline twice daily for the earlier of total wound closure or Week 24

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
